scale.h1: text-4xl md:text-5xl lg:text-6xl font-black tracking-tight leading-none
scale.caption: text-sm text-muted-foreground uppercase tracking-widest

rules: Use 1px borders (#27272a) to define structure, not shadows.
AI elements should have a subtle purple/blue glow.

grid_system.marketing: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-8 lg:grid-cols-12 gap-8 md:gap-12

buttons.primary: bg-primary hover:bg-primary/90 text-primary-foreground rounded-md shadow-[0_0_10px_rgba(59,130,246,0.5)] transition-all duration-300 hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(59,130,246,0.6)]
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary hover:bg-secondary/80 text-secondary-foreground rounded-md border border-border transition-all duration-200
buttons.outline: border border-input bg-background hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground rounded-md

cards.dashboard: bg-card border border-border rounded-md shadow-sm hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-300 relative overflow-hidden
cards.marketing: bg-transparent border border-white/10 rounded-lg backdrop-blur-sm hover:bg-white/5 transition-all duration-300

inputs.style: bg-input/50 border-input focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary rounded-md h-10 px-3 text-sm placeholder:text-muted-foreground/70

badges.status_success: bg-success/15 text-success border border-success/20 rounded-full px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-medium
badges.status_pending: bg-warning/15 text-warning border border-warning/20 rounded-full px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-medium
badges.status_error: bg-destructive/15 text-destructive border border-destructive/20 rounded-full px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-medium
badges.ai_tag: bg-purple-500/15 text-purple-400 border border-purple-500/20 rounded-full px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-medium flex items-center gap-1

visual_enhancers.noise_texture: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noiseFilter'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.65' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noiseFilter)' opacity='0.05'/%3E%3C/svg%3E")

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure text is at least 4.5:1 against background. Use lighter grays (#d4d4d8) for body text on dark backgrounds.

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Chivo' for all Headings and 'IBM Plex Sans' for body.
Implement the dark theme by default using the provided hex codes.
Use the Bento Grid layout for the dashboard overview.
For the AI Agent Dashboard, create a node-graph visualization using 'recharts' (scatter chart customized) or SVG if simple, or install 'react-flow-renderer' if permitted.
Use the 'status_success', 'status_pending' badge styles for project states.
Login page should use the 'hero_abstract' image as a subtle background with an overlay.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states defined in the 'buttons' section.
Do not use gradients for text.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
Do not apply 'transition: all'. Use specific transitions.
Do not center align the app container.
